ALD.pfeiffer_vgc package¶

Submodules¶

ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_hw module¶

Created on Nov 20, 2017

@author: Alan Buckley <alanbuckley@berkeley.edu>
<alanbuckley@lbl.gov>
class ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_hw.Pfeiffer_VGC_Hardware(app, debug=False, name=None)¶

Bases: ScopeFoundry.hardware.HardwareComponent

This hardware component module establishes a connection with the Pfeiffer MaxiGauge TPG 256A and connects its LoggedQuantities to their respective functions.

IMPORTANT: Call functions defined in this Hardware module to retrieve data as opposed to calling lower level functions. These functions account for the way data is structured when returned at the lower level.

connect()¶

Establishes connections between LoggedQuantities and their readout functions.

Automatically updates LoggedQuantities once to reflect system state at time of established connection.

disconnect()¶
  • Disconnects hardware module connections.
  • Closes interface level serial connection.
name = 'pfeiffer_vgc_hw'¶
read_ch1_pressure()¶

Reads pressure value off sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 1.

Returns:float. Pressure value in units of bar.
read_ch1_sensor_type()¶
Returns:string. Sensor code representing the type of sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 1.
read_ch2_pressure()¶

Reads pressure value off sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 2.

Returns:float. Pressure value in units of bar.
read_ch2_sensor_type()¶
Returns:string. Sensor code representing the type of sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 2.
read_ch3_pressure()¶

Reads pressure value off sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 3.

Returns:float. Pressure value in units of bar.
read_ch3_sensor_type()¶
Returns:string. Sensor code representing the type of sensor installed on pressure gauge controller’s channel 3.
setup()¶

ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_interface module¶

Created on Nov 20, 2017

@author: Alan Buckley <alanbuckley@berkeley.edu>
<alanbuckley@lbl.gov>
class ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_interface.Pfeiffer_VGC_Interface(port='COM3', debug=False)¶

Bases: object

This module was written to serve as a library defining a small collection of serial commands written according to the Pfeiffer TPG 256A manufacturer specific communications protocol.

ask_cmd(cmd)¶

Issues correctly formatted commands/inquiries to Pfeiffer VGC.

Arguments Type Description
cmd str ASCII string to be sent to the vacuum gauge controller
Returns:str. Response to original inquiry.
close()¶

Properly closes host serial connection to VGC controller.

name = 'pfeiffer_vgc_interface'¶
read_sensor(sensor)¶

Reads pressure from specified sensor/channel number.

Arguments Type Description
sensor int Channel number assigned to pressure sensor by vacuum gauge controller
read_units()¶
Returns:Units which are currently displayed on the VGC controller display.
sensor_type()¶
Returns:A list of sensor types detected on each VGC channel.
write_units(unit_string)¶

Writes the units to be shown on controller display. Does not affect RS232 readout.

ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_measure module¶

Created on Nov 20, 2017

@author: Alan Buckley <alanbuckley@berkeley.edu>
<alanbuckley@lbl.gov>
class ALD.pfeiffer_vgc.pfeiffer_vgc_measure.Pfeiffer_VGC_Measure(app)¶

Bases: ScopeFoundry.measurement.Measurement

This class creates a measurement tab in the ScopeFoundry MDI interface a widget contained in which, contains live plotting features and export features.

This allows the user to not only monitor the pressure history with respect to time, but also dump the recorded arrays, self.pressure_history and self.time_history to export .npy files.

db_connect()¶

Creates and establishes database object to be utilized in measurement routine as a method of data transcription.

Currently not in use.

disconnect_server()¶

Disconnects from database wrapper. Currently not in use.

dockArea_setup()¶

Creates dock objects and determines order of dockArea widget placement in UI.

This function is called from ui_setup()

export_to_disk()¶

Exports numpy data arrays to disk. Writes to self.settings.save_path Function connected to and called by self.export_button

name = 'pfeiffer_vgc_measure'¶
read_pressures()¶

Reads data off of LoggedQuantities and stores the in numpy array

Called from routine()

Returns:Numpy array of pressure values taken from Pfeiffer Vacuum Gauge controller.
reconnect_server()¶

Connects to database wrapper. Currently not in use.

routine()¶

Reads data off of LoggedQuantities and stores them in Numpy array self.pressure_history

self.read_pressures is called to obtain pressures from Pfeiffer VGC. This includes for following measurements:

  • Pirani Gauge
  • Compact Full Range Gauge

A direct read from logged quantity app.hardware.mks_600_hw.settings.pressure yields a pressure reading from the manometer installed on the MKS 600 pressure regulator.

run()¶
setup()¶

Establishes LoggedQuantities and their initial values.

setup_buffers_constants()¶

Creates constants for use in live plotting features.

This function reads from the following logged quantities and their initial values to create initial arrays.

LoggedQuantity Type Description
history_length int Length of data array to record pressure values over time.
display_window int Section of data array to be displayed in live plot.

Called once from setup()

setup_export_widget()¶

Creates export widget in measurement UI

Called from widget_setup()

setup_plot_group_widget()¶

Creates plot objects in measurement UI. These are updated by update_display()

Called from widget_setup()

ui_setup()¶

Calls all functions needed to set up UI programmatically. This object is called from setup()

update_display()¶

Updates plots with data written to Numpy array self.pressure_history This function is automatically called repeatedly when the measurement module is started.

widget_setup()¶

Runs collection of widget setup functions each of which creates the widget and then populates them. This function is called from ui_setup()
